explains: n. 损害，伤害；造成损害（或损伤）的事物
wordGroup: to the detriment of 对…不利

sentences.en: He was engrossed in his job to the detriment of his health.
sentences.cn: 他全身心地投入工作结果损害了他的健康。

sentences.en: These difficulties have been overcome without detriment to performance.
sentences.cn: 这些困难已经被克服了，且没有损害到表演。

sentences.en: These tests will give too much importance to written exams to the detriment of other skills.
sentences.cn: 这些测试会太侧重于书面考核而有损于其他技能。
